name: Bloom
description: Fight your way through the hordes of demon summoners to destroy the black flower before it BLOOMS...spilling rivers of pixelated blood to psychedelic metal tunes in this classic frenetic action FPS indie game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 1050 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
